translation.en: [chuckles] Show me the tummy!
-Good boy, Pugsley! -[whimpers]
[Barney] Come on, boy. Let's go.
[woman on TV] Oh, it's Grandpa!
translation.de: Du meine Güte. Es ist Opa.

translation.en: [gasps] Is he dead?
[man on TV] No, miss, he's just… frozen.
[woman] At his own birthday party too.
-"His big special day." -[woman] His big special day.
[man] And he seemed so happy in the photographs.
translation.de: Auf den Fotos lächelte er immer.

translation.en: Wait, that's it.
Photographs capture the soul of the subject.
translation.de: Fotos fangen die Seele des Motivs ein.

translation.en: The only question is, how are we gonna get Grandpa…
translation.de: Die Frage ist nur: Wie kriegen wir Opa zurück in Opa?

translation.en: -[sinister music playing] -…back in Grandpa!
translation.de: Die Frage ist nur: Wie kriegen wir Opa zurück in Opa? "ENDE"

translation.en: Okay, Mom. Ask me what my biggest weakness is.
translation.de: Ok, Ma. -Frag nach meiner Schwäche. -Fettige Haut?

translation.en: Oily skin?
I'm serious. I was gonna go with something like "paralyzing fear of confrontation."
translation.de: Nein, ich würde so was wie "lähmende Konfrontationsangst" sagen.

translation.en: Uh, sweetie, why do you wanna know your biggest weakness?
My job interview at Phoenix Parks.
translation.de: Ich bewerbe mich im Phoenix Park.

translation.en: Tonight. I told you.
Uh, but Grammy Gram's coming for dinner. I made cheese-less mac and cheese.
translation.de: Aber Omilein kommt. Es gibt Mac'n'Cheese ohne Käse!

translation.en: Ugh, Mom, did you tell her I would be there?
translation.de: Weiß sie, dass ich hier bin?

translation.en: Yeah, of course.
Did you tell her Barney would be there?
Oh, come on, sweetie, there's a lot she doesn't understand.
translation.de: Ach Schatz. Sie versteht vieles nicht.

translation.en: [scoffs] She's not the only one.
-[whimpers] -[chuckles] Sorry, buddy, you can't come.
translation.de: Sorry. Du kannst nicht mit. Aber bald sind wir hier weg.

translation.en: But if I get this job, we can get a place of our own.
translation.de: Du kannst nicht mit. Aber bald sind wir hier weg.

translation.en: Just you and me. No Mom, no Dad, [scoffs] no Grammy Gram.
translation.de: Du und ich. Ohne Mom, Dad und Omilein.

translation.en: Okay, fine. Come on.
[laughs] Oh, stop it.
Oh, my precious girl! Going to her first job interview!
translation.de: Mein kleiner Schatz! Dein erstes Vorstellungsgespräch!

translation.en: -[sniffling] -Mom!
Call me before you go in.
translation.de: Ruf mich vorher und nachher an.

translation.en: And after. And maybe during too?
translation.de: Ruf mich vorher und nachher an. Und währenddessen!

translation.en: [chuckling] Bye, Mom.
[over phone] Just checking you've got your phone.
If you whizz in my bag again, I'm sending you right back home, young man.
translation.de: Pinkel ja nicht wieder da rein.

translation.en: [Norma] Oh, jeez. Strange dude. Talking to himself.
translation.de: Meine Güte. Seltsamer Typ, der mit sich selbst redet.

translation.en: Okay, maybe Mom was right and I should never go outside.
translation.de: Mom hatte recht. Ich hätte nicht gehen sollen.

translation.en: Or at least I think that's what she was trying to say.
translation.de: Das wollte sie mir damit sagen, oder?

translation.en: Uh… You're the one talking to yourself, Norma. [grunting] How do you know my name?
translation.de: -Du redest mit dir selbst, Norma. -Du kennst mich?

translation.en: -Whoa! It's me, Barney. -Uh, I'm bad with names.
We literally live on the same street. Same school. We're lab partners!
I'm bad with… faces.
Hello, I'm Pauline Phoenix.
You know, in just a few ticks, we'll be at my very own theme park.
translation.de: Wir kommen jeden Moment in meinem eigenen Freizeitpark an.

translation.en: Thank you. Where the fun just never stops, except November through to March.
translation.de: Dort hört der Spaß niemals auf. Außer von November bis März.

translation.en: We've got five zones for you all to enjoy, based on my movies, music and TV shows.
translation.de: Es gibt fünf spaßige Bereiche, die auf meinen Produktionen beruhen.

translation.en: Remember, consuming outside food and drink is a big no-no.
translation.de: Essen und Trinken mitzubringen, ist absolut tabu.

translation.en: And if you see anything that seems just a little outta sorts,
you know, anything suspicious or supernatural at all, [chuckling] well, just keep it to yourself, darlin'.
translation.de: oder irgendwas Verdächtiges, behaltet's doch einfach für euch.

translation.en: -Did you see that? -Yeah, we're almost there.
[Pauline over speakers] Thank you for visiting Phoenix Parks.
-[breathes deeply] -[Pauline] Y'all enjoy yourselves! Or else.
I hope y'all come back soon.
Safe trip. Take care now. Don't sue. [chuckles]
translation.de: Gute Reise! Passt auf euch auf! Nicht klagen!

translation.en: Okay, you can stop following me now, creep.
translation.de: Hör auf mir zu folgen, Creep.

translation.en: I'm not following you. And I'm not a creep.
translation.de: Tue ich nicht, und bin ich nicht. Ich bin für einen Job hier.

translation.en: -I've got a job interview down here. -Wait.
translation.de: Tue ich nicht, und bin ich nicht. Ich bin für einen Job hier. Moment. "Freie Stelle im Phoenix Park, Dead-End-Attraktion. Bei Sonnenuntergang.

translation.en: "Opportunity at Phoenix Parks, Dead End Attraction." "Please arrive at sundown."
translation.de: Moment. "Freie Stelle im Phoenix Park, Dead-End-Attraktion. Bei Sonnenuntergang.

translation.en: [both] "Rare opening for the one perfect candidate."
-Well, good luck. -Thanks!
Wait!
-Okay. You ready, boy? -[barks]
Torpe-dog!
-[barks] -Good boy.
[gasps] What?
-How did that happen? -I took the staff line.
translation.de: Wo kommst du her? -Über den Mitarbeiterweg. -Oh.

translation.en: Oh, my ghosts! This is so cool.
translation.de: Oh mein Geist! Das ist so cool. Hier war seit einem Jahr niemand mehr!

translation.en: No one's been in here for a year. Not since the Jennifer Swan incident.
translation.de: Das ist so cool. Hier war seit einem Jahr niemand mehr! -Nicht seit dem Jennifer-Swan-Vorfall! -Was?

translation.en: Jennifer Swan?
It was on a night like tonight. Except it was raining.
translation.de: An einem Abend wie heute, aber mit Regen.

translation.en: And I think it was a Thursday morning, actually.
One of the parks' Pauline impersonators entered Dead End…
translation.de: Einer der Pauline-Imitatoren kam hier rein,

translation.en: -[sinister music playing] -…and never came out!
She died? In here?
Whoa! No, I just said she didn't come out.
translation.de: Sie kam bloß nicht mehr raus.

translation.en: She just "disappeared."
-I can't believe you didn't know. -[sniffing] [Barney] All right.
Don't you know anything about Dead End? I'm clearly the better candidate for this job.
translation.de: Weißt du nichts über Dead End? Ich bin echt besser geeignet.

translation.en: That stuff doesn't matter. It's about being a responsible employee.
translation.de: Das ist egal. Es geht hier um Verantwortung.

translation.en: Your dog is whizzing on the furniture. [gasps] Pugs… Pugsley! No!
[Norma] Go on. Ask me anything.
Uh, how do you get dog pee out of cobwebs? About Pauline! Dead End. This park.
translation.de: -Kriegt man Urin aus Spinnweben? -Über Pauline, Dead End, diesen Park!

translation.en: I know everything. Every cast member. Every episode. Every single nut and bolt of this whole darn attraction.
translation.de: Ich weiß einfach alles über das komplette Fahrgeschäft.

translation.en: Who's that?
[chuckles] Easy, that's old Charlie Bonaparte.
-Full name Charles… -[yelps] Welcome, mortals.
-…and grandfather once removed to… -[grunts]
[Pauline over speakers] Your beautiful photograph is ready to collect.
translation.de: Du kannst dein Foto jetzt abholen!

translation.en: [Norma] …at the full moon. AKA, he's a werewolf.
Although, they didn't establish that… Are you even listening?
translation.de: Aber erst in Staffel… Hörst du mir zu?

translation.en: Sitting around on the job? Glad I'm not his boss. [chuckles]
translation.de: Sitzen bei der Arbeit! Das gäbe es bei mir nicht.

translation.en: Oh, hi. I'm Norma Khan. I'm here for the job opportunity…
translation.de: Hi, ich bin Norma Khan. Ich will den Job.

translation.en: [pants] Hi. And I'm Barney.
And you must be the manager. Love the costume.
translation.de: Du leitest das hier? Tolles Kostüm.

translation.en: And you two must be the offerings. I didn't know there'd be a choice.
translation.de: Ihr seid wohl die Opfergaben. Ich habe sogar die Wahl…

translation.en: There isn't. Uh, here's my resume, references… [Norma] …and proof of visits to Dead End… -[yawns] -[Norma] …ages seven through 15.
translation.de: Nein. Hier ist mein Lebenslauf, Zeugnisse und Beweise für Parkbesuche von 7 bis 15.

translation.en: And if that doesn't convince you,
translation.de: Und hier ist noch ein Brief

translation.en: take a look at this letter from the very desk of Pauline's
translation.de: Und hier ist noch ein Brief von Pauline Phoenix…

translation.en: [hesitates] secretary's intern.
-Who's Pauline Phoenix? -[gasps]
And what about you, freckles?
What makes you think you'd be a good flesh vessel?
translation.de: Warum bist du eine gute Fleischhülle?

translation.en: Mmm, flesh?
translation.de: Warum bist du eine gute Fleischhülle? -Fleisch? -Perfekt. Komm.

translation.en: Perfect. Let's go.
What? Uh, no fair!
All right, folks, get ready. He's on his way.
translation.de: Ok, macht euch bereit. Er ist unterwegs.

translation.en: Um, Norma? I don't think this is what we think it is.
Ugh! I know! Group interview. They could've warned us.
translation.de: Ja. Ein Gruppengespräch. Hätte man uns sagen können.

translation.en: Uh, excuse me! Does this job have any benefits?
Uh, wings, blood made of fire, immortality.
-[Norma] Okay, but what about dental? -[elevator thuds]
-[screams] Norma? Norma! -Excuse me? I'm talking to you.
-You haven't answered my question. -Look! Do you mind?
translation.de: Ich warte. Könntest du das lassen?

translation.en: Here he comes! [laughs] The demon king's gonna love me for bringing two humans.
translation.de: Er kommt! Der Dämonenkönig wird mich lieben. Ich habe zwei Menschen!

translation.en: Demon king? What episode was that in?
This one!
O great Temeluchus. It must be Two for Tuesday!
translation.de: Oh großer Temeluchus, es muss Deal-Dienstag sein.

translation.en: [chuckles] I got you not one, but two flesh vessels.
translation.de: Ich habe gleich zwei Hüllen für Euch!

translation.en: I rescind my application. The job's yours!
They'd both make excellent new bodies, Temeluchus.
-Which shall it be? -[growls]
Ip dip doo, the dog's got the flu,
translation.de: Ene mene nicht, der Hund hat die Gicht.

translation.en: the cat's got the chicken pox, so it's gonna be you!
translation.de: Die Katze hat die Windpocken, darum wähl ich dich!

translation.en: Good choice. Fleshy.
[distorted] Pugsley!
Fellow demons, let us join hands, claws, tentacles.
translation.de: Dämonen, lasst uns Hände, Klauen, Tentakel halten.

translation.en: ♪ Seal the body up Seal the body up ♪
♪ Pull, pull, smash, smash, smash! ♪
Oh, no! Pugsley!
Pugsley, come on, buddy! Open your eyes. Pugsley, please.
translation.de: Oh nein. Komm schon! Öffne die Augen. Pugsley? Bitte!

translation.en: Do not give orders to the great Temeluchus!
translation.de: Gib dem großen Temeluchus keine Befehle!

translation.en: Tremble, for Temeluchus lives again.
I specifically requested no photographs. Yeah. Uh, sorry about that.
translation.de: -Ich sagte, keine Fotos. -Ja, tut mir leid.

translation.en: But, uh, I was wondering, since I provided two excellent vessels and fulfilled my side of the bargain,
translation.de: Ich habe zwei exzellente Hüllen besorgt und meinen Deal erfüllt.

translation.en: you could lift my curse and let me go back home?
translation.de: Würdet Ihr mich nach Hause lassen?

translation.en: Hmm. No!
I was specific.
Humans, tell me. Who is the king of this realm?
-We don't have a king. -Your ruler. Your commander.
translation.de: Wir haben keinen. Euer Herrscher, euer Anführer. Ich würde ihn gern essen.

translation.en: I would very much like to eat them.
translation.de: Euer Herrscher, euer Anführer. Ich würde ihn gern essen.

translation.en: Oh, well, there's a little White House about 2,000 miles that way.
translation.de: In diese Richtung steht ein weißes Haus.

translation.en: Enough! I shall find and claim my own throne.
translation.de: Das reicht! Ich finde meinen eigenen Thron.

translation.en: Oh, no. Wait, sire. Wait, sire! Sire, wait.
Ooh, what about me, please? What about me?
translation.de: Was ist mit mir? Was ist mit mir?

translation.en: [cries] I just wanna go home.
Norma, who are you calling? The dog pound?
translation.de: Wen rufst du an? Den Tierschutz?

translation.en: No, my mom. She can take us home.
translation.de: Meine Mom. Sie kann uns abholen.

translation.en: My dog is possessed by Temeluka… Teme…Temeloo…
translation.de: Mein Hund ist besessen von Temeluch… Teme… Teme… Vom Dämon!

translation.en: -Uh, a demon! -Yeah. It possessed your dog, not us.
translation.de: Teme… Teme… Vom Dämon! Ja. Dein Hund. Nicht wir. Wir sollten verschwinden.

translation.en: -So let's escape while we still can. -[line ringing]
translation.de: Ja. Dein Hund. Nicht wir. Wir sollten verschwinden.

translation.en: Pugsley's not just my dog. He's my family.
The only family that's always had my back. And I can't lose him.
translation.de: Er hat mich immer unterstützt. Ich muss ihn retten.

translation.en: [Swati over phone] Sweetie, how did it go? Did you get it?
translation.de: Schatz! Wie war es? Hast du ihn?

translation.en: -Oh, no, you didn't get it, did you? -[Barney] Pugsley! Pugsley!
[Swati] Did you want me to come and have a word with them, maybe? -I will, my little blossom-- -Hmm.
translation.de: Soll ich mit ihnen reden? Das mache ich, Schatz, wenn…

translation.en: What would Pauline do?
She'd save the dog and the park from any potential lawsuits.
translation.de: Sie würde den Hund und den Park vor möglichen Klagen retten.

translation.en: -You! -Hi, hello. Yeah, Courtney. How ya doin'?
How do we stop it?
[chuckles] You can't stop Temeluchus. He's already dead.
translation.de: Gar nicht. Er ist schon tot.

translation.en: Which is why he needs a new vessel every few hundred years.
translation.de: Deswegen brauchte er eine neue Hülle.

translation.en: So what are we talking? Salt circle? Holy water? Vacuum cleaner?
translation.de: Also? Salzkreis? Weihwasser? -Staubsauger? -Das war mein Siegelzauber.

translation.en: Ugh! Well, I did the sealing spell.
Temeluchus' soul is now in that dog for good.
translation.de: Seine Seele ist jetzt in diesem Hund.

translation.en: The only way to stop him is to kill the dog!
That's not gonna happen.
Or find some other vessel for him to possess. But the first option is way more fun.
translation.de: Eine neue Hülle ginge auch, aber das andere ist lustiger.

translation.en: I specifically requested no photographs.
Photographs capture the soul of the subject.
translation.de: Fotos fangen die Seele des Motivs ein.

translation.en: [panting] Pugsley! [panting] Pugs?
Throne.
He's looking for a throne! Yes! To Camelot! [pants]
translation.de: Thron. Er sucht einen Thron. Ja! Auf nach Camelot!

translation.en: Have you come to challenge me?
No, I don't wanna fight you, Pugsley.
translation.de: -Ich will nicht kämpfen, Pugsley. -Nenn mich nicht so!

translation.en: Stop calling me that. Kneel before Temeluchus!
translation.de: -Ich will nicht kämpfen, Pugsley. -Nenn mich nicht so! Knie nieder vor Temeluchus!

translation.en: There's a good boy. You know, your body was my first choice.
translation.de: Guter Junge. Eigentlich wollte ich deinen Körper.

translation.en: Perhaps once I've exhausted this mighty vessel,
I'll move on to your strangely unwrinkled form.
I've had many bodies over the years.
-This isn't even my first canine… -Psst. You need to take a photo.
Yeah, Norma, I think I'll remember this moment. My parents met during the Haunted Wars…
No! Photos capture the soul. You know, like in Episode 105,
translation.de: Fotos fangen die Seele ein! Wie in Folge 105, in der Paulines Großvater versteinert ist.

translation.en: in which Pauline finds the body of her grandfather petrified on the floor -after his birthday party. -Yeah, I get it.
translation.de: Wie in Folge 105, in der Paulines Großvater versteinert ist.

translation.en: Just take the photo. [groans] But my mom says my phone is for emergencies only.
translation.de: -Mach du das Foto! -Mein Handy ist nur für Notfälle!

translation.en: -What do you call this? -Okay, okay.
-[Temeluchus speaking indistinctly] -[Norma] Say cheese!
-[cell phone ringing] -No, no, no, no, no.
No photos!
This is what I think of your pathetic toys. [laughs]
translation.de: Das halte ich von euren Spielzeugen!

translation.en: Yeah? Well, I was due an upgrade anyway!
translation.de: Ach ja? Ich brauchte eh ein neues!

translation.en: [Temeluchus] Fool. You think you can outsmart me?
translation.de: Du denkst, du kannst mich überlisten?

translation.en: Now it is your turn to be crushed to pieces!
translation.de: Ich werde dich in Stücke reißen!

translation.en: Quick! Get in the log!
If you want me, come and get me!
[yelps] Norma! Help!
I've got a plan! Just keep him busy till we get to the drop!
translation.de: Ich habe einen Plan! Beschäftige ihn!

translation.en: Oh, don't worry, he's busy!
[laughs] Nice try.
Get down!
[gasps] Pugsley's fighting back from the inside.
What did you just do to me? Some tricksy spell?
translation.de: Was war das gerade? Ein Zauber?

translation.en: Pugsley, sit!
[groans] Witches? I knew it!
[Norma] Doggie!
-Huh? -Fetch!
[splutters] I know your plan! -And it won't work! -[groans]
Any last words?
[grunts] Show me the tummy!
-[laughs] Oh, no! -Who's a good boy? -[Temeluchus laughs] -Who's a good boy?
-Oh! No! No! No, no! [laughing] -Let me get that. Who's a good boy?
-Come on, Norma! -[grunting] Trying!
-[laughing] No! No! -That's it. Show me the tummy.
-[grunts] -Happy puppy. Good boy. Norma. Norma, now!
[Barney] Pugsley?
Pugsley, wake up. [crying]
Pugsley, wake up. [sniffles]
Wake up.
[gasps] Pugsley? Pugsley! You're alive?
[laughs] Pugsley! Oh!
Thank you, Norma. You didn't have to help us.
translation.de: Oh, danke, Norma! -Danke für die Hilfe. -Ich tat es für Pauline.

translation.en: Oh, no. I did it for Pauline.
translation.de: -Danke für die Hilfe. -Ich tat es für Pauline.

translation.en: [Pauline over speakers] Your beautiful photograph is ready to collect.
translation.de: Du kannst dein Foto jetzt abholen!

translation.en: -[whimpers] -Don't worry, buddy. It's all over now. There's still one more thing for us to do.
translation.de: -Keine Sorge, Kumpel. Es ist vorbei. -Eine Sache wäre da noch…

translation.en: [Courtney] Ugh! Let me in!
Wait. You guys are alive? What happened to Temeluchus?
translation.de: Moment. Ihr lebt? Was ist mit Temeluchus?

translation.en: Oh, he had a great time in the park. And made lots of memories.
[screams] How am I ever gonna get myself un-banished now?
translation.de: Und wie werde ich den Fluch jetzt los?

translation.en: You know, I'm glad we're alive but, uh, I still really wanted that job.
translation.de: Ich bin froh, dass wir leben, aber ich wollte den Job echt.

translation.en: Yeah, me too. Guess I'll just spend another 15 years hyper-fixating on something else.
translation.de: Ja, ich auch. Zeit für die nächste Hyperfokussierung.

translation.en: Wait, wait! Wait! Humans. [chuckles] What do you want now?
translation.de: -Wartet! Menschen! -Was willst du jetzt schon wieder?

translation.en: Don't you wanna know who got the job? You tricked us. There is no job.
translation.de: -Wollt ihr wissen, wer den Job hat? -Es gab keinen!

translation.en: In this place, there's always a job going. [chuckles]
translation.de: Hier gibt es immer einen Job.

translation.en: I tend to scare away most security guards. Put these on and you'll blend right in.
translation.de: Wachleute haben Angst vor mir. Zieht die hier an.

translation.en: You guys are like demon-buster extraordinaires. I need you guys around.
translation.de: Ihr seid Eins-a-Dämonenjäger. Ich brauche euch.

translation.en: Wouldn't we be the last people you'd want hanging around?
Not all demons are as friendly and forgiving as I am.
translation.de: Nicht alle Dämonen sind so freundlich wie ich.

translation.en: After what happened today, I feel I'm gonna need a lot of security around.
translation.de: Und nach heute brauche ich Sicherheitspersonal.

translation.en: So what do you say?
-Well, to be honest… -[squeals] I got the job! -I got it! [laughs] -[Swati laughing over phone]
translation.de: -Um ehrlich zu sein… -Ich hab den Job!

translation.en: I'll be right over to pick you up!
-There's going to be a big party tonight. -Psst. Norma. -Ma, wait. See you in a minute. -Oh, I'm so--
Do you think we can trust her?
Hmm. Well, she is a demon. I try not to judge people on appearance.
translation.de: -Sie ist ein Dämon. -Ich urteile nicht nach Aussehen.

translation.en: And she did try to sacrifice us.
Or experience. Or deep-seated gut instincts.
translation.de: -Und sie wollte uns opfern. -Oder Erfahrung. Oder Bauchgefühl.

translation.en: Anyhow, Mom's coming to pick me up for celebration tacos.
translation.de: Jedenfalls… Mom will mit mir Tacos essen.

translation.en: [chuckles] Uh, wanna come with me, Barney? Hey! You remembered my name.
translation.de: -Willst du mit, Barney? -Du kennst meinen Namen!

translation.en: Don't make it weird. Uh, so what do you say?
translation.de: Mach es nicht komisch. Also, was sagst du?

translation.en: My whole family's going out for dinner. [chuckles]
translation.de: Meine ganze Familie kommt mit, sogar meine Oma.

translation.en: Even my grandma. Uh, wanna come?
translation.de: Meine ganze Familie kommt mit, sogar meine Oma. Also?

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna stick around here for just a little bit.
Maybe get a shift in right away. For the overtime.
-You have fun, partner. -[gasps]
Don't suppose this place has any bedrooms?
Whoa!
So, my liege… [chuckles nervously]
Sorry about that. No, uh… No hard feelings.
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Nichts für ungut.

translation.en: Hmm. There's a bit of you missing.
Where did that go?
[Barney] Ah, it's perfect. For tonight, at least.
Oh, how thoughtless of me. Here you go.
translation.de: Oh, wie unhöflich von mir. Hier.

translation.en: Ah! A place of our own. Just like I said.
[yawns] Night-night, Pugsley.
[Pugsley] Night-night, Barney.
